nodes.title: Note+ (mtb)
widgets_values:
SDXL主模型的总体成像质量优于SD 1.5模型。但目前支持无缝拼接的k采样器都没有针对SDXL的Refine功能，所以推荐选用不需要Refine模型的SDXL主模型，开源社区有很多选择。


===============


The overall imaging quality of the SDXL model is better than the SD 1.5 model. However, currently none of the ksamplers that support seamless splicing have the Refine function for SDXL, so it is recommended to use the SDXL model that does not require a Refine model. There are many choices in the open source community.

nodes.title: Note+ (mtb)
widgets_values:
在LoRA堆栈中可以根据实际需求，堆叠多个LoRA来调配纹理的风格化。初始设置中只使用了StabilityAI官方的SDXL offset LoRA。


====================


In the LoRA stacker, multiple LoRAs can be stacked to adjust the stylization of the texture according to actual needs. Only StabilityAI's official SDXL offset LoRA is used in the initial settings.

nodes.title: Note+ (mtb)
widgets_values:
“Use Reference Image Or Not”这个节点决定了整个工作流是否使用参考图。当设置为“0”时，流程将忽略参考图，完全采用文生图的方式工作；当设置为“1”时，流程将启用参考图，使用IPAdapter与图生图的方式工做。启用参考图后，需要通过调整“Img2Img Denoise”来确定最终纹理与参考图的相似性，注意这个参数的有效值为“0.1-1.0”。另外，也可以通过调整IPAdapter相关参数来进一步调整相似度，如需调整请移步至IPAdapter Module。

=============================

The "Use Reference Image Or Not" node determines whether the entire workflow uses the reference image. When set to "0", the workflow will ignore the reference image and work completely in the way of Tex2Img; when set to "1", the workflow will enable the reference image and work in the way of IPAdapter and Img2Img. After enabling the reference image, you need to adjust "Img2Img Denoise" to determine the similarity between the final texture and the reference image. Note that the valid value of this parameter is "0.1-1.0". In addition, you can further adjust the similarity by adjusting IPAdapter related parameters. If you need to adjust, please go to IPAdapter Module.

nodes.title: Note+ (mtb)
widgets_values:
启用 Img2Img 模式时，对于参考图的原始画幅纵横比及其具体分辨率没有要求，可以是任意图片。在将参考图编码到 Latent 空间之前，会先将该图片以其最短边为基准缩放至2048，再按照1:1画幅裁剪成 2048X2048 大小。因此，通常情况下，该模块不需要做任何修改。


====================


When Img2Img mode is enabled, there are no requirements for the original aspect ratio of the reference image and its specific resolution. Before encoding the reference image into Latent space, the image will be scaled to 2048 based on its shortest side, and then cropped to 2048X2048 according to the 1:1 frame. Therefore, normally, this module does not require any modifications.
blurry,low quality,shadows,depth of field, cracks,tilted,ball shape

nodes.title: Note+ (mtb)
widgets_values:
多数情况下，不需要修改描述词的 Prefix 和 Suffix ，这部分的文本主要是为了更符合纹理贴图的特性，比如说尽量采用俯视视角，减少强烈光影，强调无缝拼接等特性。

==============================

In most cases, there is no need to modify the Prefix and Suffix of the Prompt. This part of the text is mainly to better conform to the characteristics of the texture map. For example, try to use a top-down perspective, reduce strong light and shadow, and emphasize seamless splicing and other characteristics.

nodes.title: Note+ (mtb)
widgets_values:
IPAdapter 模块的参数调整自由度比较高，完全按照你自己的需求调整，具体用法请参看 IPAdapter Plus 作者的 Youtube 视频。需要注意的是，它只在启用 Img2Img 模式后才有效，且它的参考数据源同样为 Img2Img 所用的参考图。


====================


The IPAdapter module has a relatively high degree of freedom in parameter adjustment and can be adjusted completely according to your own needs. For specific usage, please refer to the Youtube video of the author of IPAdapter Plus. It should be noted that it is only effective after enabling Img2Img mode, and its reference data source is also the reference image used by Img2Img.

nodes.title: Note+ (mtb)
widgets_values:
这个模块用来设置最终纹理输出的路径和文件名。只需要关注四个黄颜色节点，其余结构已经梳理完善，不需要进行修改。文件的输出路径由 ”Output Path Prefix“ 、”Timestamp“ 、 ”Subject Name“ 三项共同决定，其中前两项连接后定义了输出的主目录，”Timestamp“ 建议不做修改， ”Subject Name“ 会在主目录下创建子目录，建议用描述词中的主题来命名这一项，”File Name Prefix“ 与各个纹理的 ”Suffix“ 组合成最终文件的名称。

==============================

This module is used to set the path and file name of the final texture output. You only need to pay attention to the four yellow nodes, the rest of the structure has been sorted out and does not need to be modified. The output path of the file is determined by "Output Path Prefix", "Timestamp", and "Subject Name". The first two define the output home directory after being concated. "Timestamp" is not recommended to be modified, and "Subject Name" will Create a subdirectory under the main directory. It is recommended to name this item with the subject in the prompt. The "File Name Prefix" and the "Suffix" of each texture are concated to form the name of the final file.

nodes.title: Note+ (mtb)
widgets_values:
整个工作流的目的是用 AI 来生成三维动画相关领域中常用的无缝平铺纹理，工作流所依赖的核心用户自定义节点为 FlyingFireCo 创建的 tiled_ksampler 。由于该储存库还未被收录在 Manager 中，所以您可能需要从其URL进行手动安装，网址如下：


https://github.com/FlyingFireCo/tiled_ksampler


显然，本工作流程也用到了很多其它自定义节点，这些在 Manager 中都可以查找到并妥善安装，在此就不一一列举了。


本次更新全部重构了之前的工作流，结构更加模块化，同时抛弃了 1K 纹理的生成，将 2K 纹理设定为默认精度，并加入了 Normal、Height、Curvature、AO 纹理的生成。工作流并未提供 4K 精度，主要是考虑生成所占用的 GPU 资源，您可以根据需要使用其它 AI 放大工具，从 2K 精度迭代出 4K 纹理。需要指出的是，该工作流中 AO 纹理的生成并非精准算法，而是一种视觉上近似的假象算法，我只是将 Curvature 纹理做了简单的 Level 调整，因此针对不同的案例，您或许需要通过几次手动调整才能得到较为满意的效果，调节方法请转到 “Ambient Occlusion Generator” 查看。


该工作流并未提供 Roughness 与 Metallic 纹理的生成，原因是针对不同应用场景，这两种纹理不具备明确的通用性，往往需要根据不同项目做不同设置，通常可以在三维或贴图软件中，将该工作流程中生成的纹理及各种程序化遮罩相结合，调配出多种版本的结果。


本工作流已经做了大量模块化处理，多数模块组中都写了双语注释，可以参看后，根据实际需求，做相应的参数调整。某些模块中没有注释文本，那么说明在大多数情况下，这个模块不需要做调整。


### ***使用本工作流的主要技巧是从 “Fast Groups Bypasser” 和 “Global Seed” 这两个节点开始。 “Fast Groups Bypasser” 可以快速启用或绕开特定模块，比如初始时，可以绕开 Normal 、Height 、Curvature 、AO 、 Output Saveing 等功能模块，并将 “Global Seed” 的模式设为 “randomize” ，这样可以方便我们找到满意的 “seed” 。获得满意的 “seed” 后，可以将模式设为 “fixed”，并启用 Normal 、Height 、Curvature 、AO 生成器，此时或许需要适当调整 AO 的参数，直至获得满意效果。最后再启用 Output Saveing 以获得最终的纹理文件。***


本工作流程包含 Tex2Img 与 Img2Img 两种模式，其中 Img2Img 可以将各种已有图片素材，如拍摄的照片转换成无缝纹理。Tex2Img 是默认模式，如需进行模式切换，请移步至 ”Reference Image Module“进行设置。


==============================================================================================


The purpose of the entire workflow is to use AI to generate seamless tile textures commonly used in 3D animation-related fields. The core custom node that the workflow relies on is tiled_ksampler created by FlyingFireCo. Since this repository is not yet included in Manager, you may need to install it manually from its URL:


https://github.com/FlyingFireCo/tiled_ksampler


Obviously, this workflow also uses many other custom nodes, which can be found and properly installed in the Manager, so I will not list them one by one here.


This update completely restructures the previous workflow and makes the structure more modular. It also abandons the generation of 1K textures, sets 2K textures as the default precision, and adds the generation of Normal, Height, Curvature, and AO textures. This workflow does not provide 4K accuracy, mainly due to the GPU resource consumption of generations. You can use other AI upscaling tools as needed to iterate from 2K accuracy to 4K textures.It should be pointed out that the generation of AO texture in this workflow is not an exact algorithm, but a visually approximate illusion algorithm. I just made a simple Level adjustment on the Curvature texture, so for different situations you may need to make a few manual adjustments to get a satisfactory result. Go to the Ambient Occlusion Generator to see how to adjust it.


This workflow does not provide the generation of Roughness and Metallic textures. The reason is that these two textures are not obviously versatile for different application scenarios, and often require different settings according to different projects. Typically, they can be generated in 3D or Texture Painting software. The textures generated in this workflow can be combined with various procedural masks to create various versions of both textures.


Workflows have been extensively modularized and bilingual annotations have been written for most module groups. You can refer to it and make corresponding parameter adjustments according to actual needs. Some modules do not have comment text, which means that in most cases, this module does not require adjustment.


### ***The main tip for using this workflow is to start with the "Fast Groups Bypasser" and "Global Seed" nodes. "Fast Groups Bypasser" can quickly enable or bypass specific modules. For example, initially, you can bypass functional modules such as Normal, Height, Curvature, AO, and Output Saving, and set the mode of "Global Seed" to "randomize", so that It is convenient for us to find a satisfactory "seed". After obtaining a satisfactory "seed", you can set the mode to "fixed" and enable the Normal, Height, Curvature, and AO generators. At this time, you may need to adjust the AO parameters appropriately until you obtain satisfactory results. Finally enable Output Saving to get the final texture file.***


This workflow includes two modes: Tex2Img and Img2Img. Img2Img can convert various existing image materials, such as captured photos, into seamless textures. Tex2Img is the default mode. If you need to switch modes, please go to "Reference Image Module" to set it.

nodes.title: Note+ (mtb)
widgets_values:
在不同的案例中，您可能需要调整 “Image Levels Adjustment” 节点中的三项参数，以便得到恰当的 AO 视觉外观。


=======================


In different cases, you may need to adjust the three parameters in the "Image Levels Adjustment" node to get the proper visual appearance of the AO.

nodes.title: Note+ (mtb)
widgets_values:
如同其它 KSampler 节点一样，“Tiled KSampler” 具有通用的一些参数，您可以进行各种调配尝试，此外它还具有 “tiling” 这一参数，数值为 “1” 时，确保了最终生成的图片为无缝纹理。

注意，这个节点中的 “seed” 已由 “Overall Control” 中的 “Global Seed” 控制，无需做单独设置。

另外，“Tiled KSampler” 必须与配套的 “Circular VAEDecode” 结合使用，否则会在图片边缘造成几个像素的渗色。

=======================

Like other KSampler nodes, the "Tiled KSampler" has some common parameters that allow you to make various deployment attempts. Additionally, it has a "tile" parameter. When the value is "1", the final generated image is guaranteed to be a seamless texture.

Note that the "seed" in this node is already controlled by the "global seed" in "Overall Control" and does not need to be set separately.

In addition, "Tiled KSampler" must be used in conjunction with the matching "Circular VAEDecode", otherwise it will cause color bleeding of several pixels at the edge of the image.

nodes.title: Positive Prompt
widgets_values: dark blue gray stone ground covered with (thick dust and mud:1.2)
